description.@value:
Genußvoll entspannt, einfach Tirolerisch - das Hotel Almhof Roswitha im Zillertal!
Das Hotel Almhof Roswitha, unser feines, kleines Refugium, in idyllischer Lage, auf 1.400 m Seehöhe an der Zillertaler Höhenstraße und nur wenige Minuten vom Skigebiet Penken gelegen.
Ob Winter oder Sommer, ungetrübt und echt, Urlaub inmitten der Tiroler Berge bei uns am Hochschwendberg.
Wir laden Sie ein, verbingen Sie erholsame und anregende Tage bei uns im Almhof Roswitha.
Ihre Familie Schneeberger.

Welcome to the Almhof Roswitha

Calmly relaxed, simply "Tyrolean" - the Hotel Almhof Roswitha in the holiday region of Mayrhofen / Hippach in the beautiful Zillertal!

Our small but mighty refuge is situated in an idyllic spot at 1,400 m altitude along the Zillertal Alpine Road, surrounded by the mountains of the Zillertal.

Whether winter or summer holidays - in the marvellous Tyrolean landscape you can spend an unforgettable holiday with your family regardless of the season.

On your summer holiday, enjoy the pleasant warmth of the summer sun and let your gaze glide across the green, intact meadows and forests of the Zillertal.

Winter lovers will find first-class ski pistes and snowboard slopes. The Hotel Almhof Roswitha is located only a few minutes by shuttle bus from the ski area Penken / Horberg (Ski  and Glacier World Zillertal 3000).

We offer you a heartfelt welcome - spend relaxing and invigorating days with us at the Almhof Roswitha!

Yours, the Schneeberger family
